book.synopsis: Pursued by the CIA, the DEA, and the Wild Card mistress of the winds, Mistral, renegade biochemist Mark Meadows uses the three personalities buried in his psyche in order to outwit his pursuers. Original.
book.title_long: Turn of the Cards (Wild Cards, Book 12)
book.dimensions: Height: 1.1 Inches, Length: 6.7 Inches, Width: 4.2 Inches
